txt: Addressing the underlying roots of conflict is the most effective and sustainable approach to fear, hatred, ignorance and racism.

Canada should support the self-determination of Palestinians.
Deny universities' free speech rights is an offence against the foundations and rights of academic freedom.
Mansour Shouman should be honoured as a Canadian Humanitarian the way we have honoured past humanitarians helping under genocide.
Yes, and this must include deescalation from Hamas - who started the conflict.
